oya atharawaraye wasaraka kalayak hawayi wishwa widyalaye eest-west sentarhi wisheshagnyayak hatiyata sewaya kaleya. 1970 di kanadawe wiktoriya wishwa widyalaye kala ithihasaya pilibanda aaradhitha sahaya mahacharya dhuraya pirinamiya. 1975-1988 kalaye ehi mahacharyawarayeku hatiyata sewaya kaleya. 88-89 kalaye ohu sewaya kale kanadawe edmantanhi albarta wishwawidyalayeya.

dumriya departhamenthuwe usas niladhariyeku hiru prawruththi anshayata kiya sitiye eeta adalawa lipiyakda nikuth kirimata apeksha karana bawayi.watup wishamatha gataluwa mul karaganimin dumriya wruththiya samithi kihipayak aarambha kala warjanayata adata sathiyak gathawanawa.kese wethath wadabalana prawahana amathya ashok abesinha prakasha kale warjanaye niratha dumriya wruththiya samithi illim kala kabinat pathrikawata anumathiya laba ganimin dumriya sewawa sanwrutha sewawak kirimata katayuthu kara athi bawin warjakayan sewayata wartha nokirima sambandhayen idiri piyawara ganna bawayi.dumriya sewawa athyawashya sewawak bawata path kirimata adala gasat pathraya nikuth kirimen pasu sewayata wartha nokarana dumriya sewakayinta erehiwa nithimaya piyawara ganna bawada hiru prawruththi anshaya sidu kala wimasimakadi wada balana prawahana amathya ashok abesinha sandahan kala.dumiriya sewawa athyawashya sewawak kara thaman sewaya athahara giya se salaka lipi yomu kirimata rajaya katayuthu kalath thama illim sandaha nisi wisaduma laba dena thek sewayata wartha nokarana bawayi warjanaye niratha wruththiya samithi pawasanne.

ranjith ampitiyawaththa biyagama wishesha warthakaru  jaya shri maha bodhin wahanse menma bauddha janathawa athara imahath gaurawa purwaka bhakthiyen wandina pudana aananda bodhin wahansegema ankurayak ropanaya kirimath samangama daham sisilasin sith niwi sanasena mahara shri wiwekarama wiharasthanaya sasanika sampradayanukulawama awathum pawathum athi pujaniya sthanayaki.mudra dakwena pilirumahanuwara kolambaa kadawatha haraha diwena maha margaya aasannaye kiribathgoda pasukarawanawath samagama aasannawana mahara shri wiwekarama wiharasthanaya iparanima siddhasthanayak nowuwath itha ikmanin shraddha buddhi sampanna sadahawathunge sith thula palapadiyam wi aththe aananda bodhiye shantha pihitimath methek wiharasthanayaka basnahira palathe di daknata labi nathi buddha prathima wahanselath iparani kramaweda anuwa yamin kerena puda pujath nithirithi nathi awabodhayen gatha sitha sanwara kara ganimata nambauru kota athi swamin wahanselage awawada ratawath nisa yayi sithe.wiharasthanadhipathi shasthrawedi garu migahathanne sangharakkhitha himi tharuna bhikshun wahanse namak wuwath gambauru aagamika nambauruwath dharmadhara bawath pasunu maha therun wahanse namakage men prasannaya.wiharasthanaye yatagiyawa pilibanda thorathuru dakwamin sangharakkhitha himi prakasha kale warsha 1925 di mema sthanayehi kuda aawasayak thibunu bawaya.
me sambandhayen karmika apanayana, aayojana prawardhana amathyanshaya wenama adhyayak sidu kara athi athara apanayanakaruwanta sahana salasima sandaha wana yojana 08 k handuna gena thibe.
